Summary: Mist or cloud that disappears then object appears and flies into cloud cover.
divs: sighting detailsthis took place on 3\8\13 around 7:07 stamped on the camera.i was looking at the clouds with my cannon rebel, them the most amazing event i ever witnessed with my own two eyes. i lock on a misty cloudy object , then all of a sudden it starts to evaporate or disappears and this this sphere type of object is there floating away from where the misty thing was. i did not see the sphere until a reveiw of the pics. i took about 15 -20 pics in a row. i have to say,the more i look the more there is.
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Wilkes-Barre
There were no other sightings in Wilkes-Barre on or around March 8th 2013
